context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review: Doctor Tejasvi explained all options clearly and the procedure were quick and painless. I liked the experience in her clinic much more compared to previous RCTs iI  had got.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The hospital is unapologetically modern. The doctor  listened very simpethitically to my agonies. I found a patient-centered approach here, which is to align all healthcare recommendations with my desires, needs, and preferences.  Here performed tests, physically examined and prescribed treatments through pain relief techniques.  The doctor focused on overall well functioning of my teeth  by establishing good doctor- patient communication and providing not only treatment options but also prevention of future dental complications.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback sir, keep encouraging us.

review: Dr Tejaswi is very patient. She addresses each and every problem in detail while examining with full attention. Had gone for root canal causing almost no pain. They are attentive in scheduling appointments for each visit calling patients prior to the visit date. I would definitely recommend this place for anyone suffering from dental issues.

review:
The entire experience was like a breeze. 

I was in and out in less than an hour [Consultation, quick tests + RCT procedure] and all my questions were answered instantly. One of the finest Dentists that I ever got treated under. 

Dr. Tejasvini and Dr. Anvesh are magicians when it comes to their work. 

Methodical, ************** Efficient, and Professional yet friendly in their approach with the patients.

review: Genuine and reliable place for all your dental problems. I went there for my father and mother's treatment. She was very much surprised when the process was done smoothly without any pain.  I appreciate Dr. Tejaswi  for her care. The results of the dental implant came out to be perfect. All are praising the cosmetic changes in my father after dental implants.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedbcak keep encoraging us.

review: A wonderful and friendly place. I've been afraid of dentists since my childhood, but thanks to Dr. Tejaswi and the rest of the staff, this is a thing of the past. Tooth cured for relatively little money. Urban Dental Wellness Clinic is Strongly recommended!!
reply_text: THANK YOU FOR YOUR VALUABLE FEEDBACK

review: Dr. Tejaswi is not only a highly qualified professional but has a human warmth that makes the visit more than pleasant. Always friendly, well predisposed and with a smile to attend to all patients. The impeccable and modern clinic. Urban Dental Clinic is Highly recommended!

“ I had a pleasant experience with Dr. K.L.Tejaswi . She is very professional, she takes time to explain what needs to be done and provides valuable advice. My tooth had been hurting and infected for months. It caused me a lot of other systemic infections. She was great with extraction. Even though I was nervous, she took time to make me comfortable and procedure was well done. I highly recommend!!”

Visited the clinic as father was going through severe pain. X-Ray revealed that there was an infection. Doctor suggested root canal surgery which maybe was a good option but she was just rushing for surgery, "we have to do it right now". * **** **** **** **** **** ** *** **** *** ******* ** ** ** **** ***** ******** *** ****** ***** **** *********** ***** *** **** *** *** **** ****** ***** *** ******** But this doctor was rushing for surgery and she wouldn't listen anything *** *** *** ***** *** *** ******** She didn't even give any medicines. **** ****** ******** *** *********** ******* Discontinued the consultation.
reply_text: HI, firstly thank you for choosing our clinic for consultation. since your father was in severe pain we suggested to go for root canal treatment first sitting so that their would be relief from pain and more over you have taken more than 30 min to tell your decision regarding root canal treatment there was never rushing in treatment, since the SANITIZATION PROCESS will take time I have asked about your opinion. We will prescribe medication we dont have medicines available. I asked you to take Ketorol DT for pain relief.
